summary: Adds A New Dwemer Dungeon To Your Skyrim. Provides Extra 30 minutes gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim.bsa / Update.bsa / Dawnguard.bsa / Dragonborn.bsa are needed to successfully load this mod.


All monsters are basically leveled but I recommend you, a vanilla user should be at least 16 or higher to safely clear Nuvanja because Nuvanja encounter zone has the minimum level 16.


You can find your new exploring site south of Helgen. 


East Empire Company hired a group of thugs to excavate this ruin, expecting relics worth some coin. Surprisingly automatons in Nuvanja didn\'t attack the invaders. So excavation once proceeded smoothly. Then suddenly words from Nuvanja disappeared. Progress of excavation became unclear, so the company sent a man to find out what happend. And no one returned. 
<There are no quests related. This is just lore-friendly backgrounds for my dungeon.>     

Enjoy Your Skyrim :D Feedback is always welcome.      


Change Log
1.0 - First Release
1.1 - Fixed Exit Problem
1.2 - Minor Upgrades
1.3 - NMM Description Added
1.5 - Removed One Exterior Tower
1.6 - \"Cleared\" Sign Added
1.7 - Enhanced Ambushes & AI
1.8 - Fixed Enemy Underwater/Bridge Path Problem. Small Environmental Change.  
1.9 - \"Cleared\" Sign was removed from 1.8 so I fixed that.
2.0 - Lowered bandits\' level. Simple Journals Added. Small Environmental Change. 

*If you\'ve already gone through the dungeon you have to make a clean save file to apply the changes of later versions. Or visit the dungeon after it respawns.
author: celticsaw
